title: Jessica K. Higgins Ph.D.
text:
Education
Ph.D. in Biology 2014 University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill, Chapel Hill, NC
B.S. in Environmental Science 2005 University of Notre Dame, Notre Dame, IN



Work Experience
Manager, Research Science at United Network for Organ Sharing (UNOS) - 2023- present
Owner, Higgins Data Solutions & Analytics - 2023- present
Director, Analytics Engineering at Atorus Research - 2021-2023
Director, Programming at Nuventra Pharma Sciences - 2016-2021
Postdoctoral Researcher at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill - 2016



Volunteer Work
I serve on the board of the James Keppel Foundation, a foundation that supports educational opportunities in the US and abroad in honor of my brother James Keppel.
I serve on the board of the Scottish Cultural Organization of the Triangle (SCOT) a non-profit dedicated to sharing and promoting knowledge of and appreciation for Scottish culture and history with people in the Triangle and Central NC.
I am passionate about supporting and Girl Scouts and am a proud leader of Troop 3890 in Chapel Hill, NC.



Hobbies
In my free time I am a Scottish highland dancer, you can see all about my love of Scottish dance and how I got into it as well as some pictures here.
When I’m not dancing and need a break, I am an avid reader. I read fantasy, sci-fi, romance etc. My reading goal for 2024 is to read 60 books and I’m almost half way there. You can check out my Goodreads to follow along.
Additionally, I love to travel especially with my kids! We have been to some amazing places together including over 10 US National Parks!



The Higgins Family at Arches National Park

title: Higgins Data Solutions & Analytics
text:
I offer expert data analysis and programming services tailored to the realm of clinical pharmacology programming, specifically CDISC, popPK, PK/PD etc. dataset creation, as well as the development of insightful tables, listings, and figures. I am committed to providing comprehensive solutions to meet your analytical needs.
Additionally, I also provide consulting expertise in leveraging open source software within the pharmaceutical domain. I am dedicated to empowering clients with the tools and knowledge needed to harness the full potential of open source technologies, fostering innovation and efficiency in drug development.
Whether you require in-depth data analysis, expert consultation, or guidance on open source software utilization, I am here to support you every step of the way. For more information contact me at HigginsDataSolutions@gmail.com

title: Jessica K. Higgins Ph.D.
text: I’m so excited to share a little bit about my background and the things that are important to me.

title: Jessica K. Higgins Ph.D.
text: I’m so excited to share a little bit about my background and the things that are important to me.

title: Highland Dance
text:
I started highland dancing in 2017 and have been at it ever since. Growing up I was a ballet dancer for 15 years and then took a long break in college and grad school. When my daughter was 4 she asked me to take a dance class with her and the rest was history! Here are a few photos of me in my kilt, aboyne, Irish jig dress, and sailor outfit for doing the Sailor’s Hornpipe dance.









Dancing the sword dance at a competition







after a competition in my aboyne dress









dancing the “Irish jig” which is funny because it’s a Scottish dance







My final leap in the “Sailor’s Hornpipe” dance, this costume is not my favorite…
